name: Summer Berry Chocolate Pudding
description: Berries & chocolate, what’s not to love? Indulge in the sweet taste of summer with a perfectly portioned dessert, ready in 10 min.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix or Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix

preparation: In a bowl, blend Chocolate Pudding Mix with milk and 2 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix. Using an electric mixer, beat on medium for 2 minutes.
Spoon into small bowls and refrigerate until chilled, 10 minutes. Toss berries with 2 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix. Spoon over puddings.

products.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Spoon after delicious spoon, satisfy your sweet tooth with a low-calorie chocolate pudding that’s decadent and oh-so-good.

products.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Rich, creamy, and dreamy! It makes a pudding in minutes – so you can enjoy it anytime you’re looking for a quick, sweet treat – and is versatile enough to make bread puddings, energy balls, caramelized carrots, and more!

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.
